suite.name: Kim Fails To Book Safari Without Date

test.name: user attempts to book VIP-Safari tickets without choosing a Date

kw.name: Given the browser is open on the correct URL
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.
Browser opens, the correct URL loads, Browser window set to maximum, Selenium speed set to 0.2s.

kw.name: When the user registers a new account
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
The user successfully registers a new account with valid credentials.

kw.name: And the user logs in with the new account
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
The user successfully login with new account

kw.name: And the user Navigates to 'Buy Tickets'

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
The user navigate and clicks on 'Buy Tickets'

kw.name: And the user adds two Adult VIP tickets to Cart
Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=ticket-type' by value Adult.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=ticket-category' by value VIP.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.
The user successfully adds two Adult VIP-Tickets to cart

kw.name: And the user adds two Children VIP tickets to Cart
Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=ticket-type' by value Child.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value

kw.name: And the user navigates to "Book Safaris"
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
The user navigate and clicks on 'Book Safaris'

kw.name: And the user tries to confirm the booking without selecting a date
Select From List By Label
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=safari-type' by label T-Rex Rumble eXtreme Thrill Pack.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
The user attempts to confirm the Safari booking without selecting a date.

kw.name: Then an error message should be displayed
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
The System checks if the browser displays the required field error message.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
